## Gender Lab Activity Timeline

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(timevis)

data <- data.frame(
  id      = 1:6,
  content = c("ISPP Conference in Lisbon","ECPG Conference in Amsterdam",
              "WPSA Panel in San Diego","MPSA Junior Scholar Symposium in Chicago",
              "Gender Lab Begins at UCR", "POSC-259"),
  start   = c("2019-07-01", "2019-06-01",
              "2019-03-15","2019-03-01",
              "2018-03-01","2018-01-01"),
  end     = c(NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA)
)

timevis(data)
```
